name: Randoween
description:
Randoween is a tower defense game where the enemies in a wave and the buildings you can place are decided by the roll of a dice. Will you try to succeed with what you get? Or will you try your luck and re-roll?

Story:

Hello, everyone. It's time for a story.

A story of two friends, and their fall from glory.

They went to the cemetery, because of the legends

of ghosts and spirits coming from the heavens.

They wanted to disprove that whole spiel.

But little did they know, it was all real.

Suddenly one of them fell for my trap

and I emerged from the shadows and started to yap

"YOU FOOLS, YOU FELL FOR IT, AIN'T THAT A SHAME!

IF YOU WANT TO FREE HIM, YOU'LL HAVE TO PLAY A GAME!"

"TAKE MY DICE, THEY ARE IMBUED WITH MAGIC!

DEFEAT MY MONSTERS, OR HIS FATE WILL BE... TRAGIC."

She took the dice and prepared for a bout.

But will she free him? Well, let's find out...

Source Code:
https://github.com/Fabianofski/GMTK-JAM-2022
